metadata.title: Kidorable Baby KidorableT-Shirt, 6-18 Months, Butterfly (Purple)
features: Kidorable Baby Girls' Butterfly T-Shirt Purple 6-18 Months, 100% Cotton Kids Shirt for Boys or Girls, Colorful Character Design, Fun and Practical, Encourages Imaginative Play

What will you be? A bee? A dolphin? A butterfly? Our durable kids t-shirts are machine washable and 100% cotton. Kidorable character t-shirts have fun, imaginative designs to keep your little one playing, dreaming & imagining indoors or outdoors all year.

Your kiddo will wear their Kidorable T-Shirt in any kind of weather. Our lightweight, 100% cotton kid's shirt is the perfect shirt for playing indoors or outdoors, at home, school, or the playground. Encourage imaginative play with Kidorable's shirts.

PREMIUM QUALITY: Kidorable T-Shirts for boys or girls are made from cozy 100% cotton for a comfortable, durable shirt that is machine-washable, so your little one can wear their favorite shirt again and again through mud puddles, playgrounds & bike rides.

Kidorable knows that kids shirts need to be comfortable as well as durable, so we've designed these shirts to be lightweight, durable, and soft in 100% cotton. Add to the fun with a fun matching umbrella, rainboots, rain coat, knit hat, scarf or gloves.
description: For everyday play. 100% cotton. Soft . Comfortable. Three-dimensional. Hand-embroidered.
